description:
ISS 08_07_2021 01:31:19, pixel scale 0.12 "/ pixel, 33 animation frames, the sky is far from ideal - shooting in the IR channel.
height ~ 71 degrees, brightness -3.6, distance at the climax 448 km, siing 2/5, transparency 4/5. (1 - bad, 5 - excellent), wind 5-7ms, no humidity. Monty eq8 evilmode v3,
Celestron C14 XLT + focuser GSO 2 "1.25x NPZ (focal ~ 5 meters) + asi290mm + zwo EFW mini + Baader LRGBI (IR685). 160fps 720Ñ…512, mono12, gain ~ 300-327 (a lot), shutter speed 0.7ms (not enough for IR, you need 0.9ms). Adding 30% of 280 adjacent frames without selection in AS! 3 with wavelets. PIPP animation 100%.
title: Animation of the ISS IR685 08.07.2021
